CustomField.formula: IF ( AND(Fleet_Asset_Aircraft__r.Base_ICAO__c != null,OR (Airport_Code__c== null, Fleet_Asset_Aircraft__r.Base_ICAO__c == Airport_Code__c)) , Fleet_Asset_Aircraft__r.Aircraft_Base__r.Name&' (ICAO=' & Fleet_Asset_Aircraft__r.Base_ICAO__c&')' , '' )
CustomField.label: Airport Name
